name: Wana Kyo3
greetingText: I really really like and love your name btw! 😍
wishText: May Allah SWT bless you with endless happiness, long age and Good Health 🤲🏻
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy returns of the Day 🌸
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and say love you to me if you liked it. Muehehe 🤪
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
